title: I want an apology from Riot right now.  Immediately.
body:
I want Fiora back from being destroyed and I want an apology for banning me from ranked and the destroying my champ because how good I was.

I want the developers to kiss my feet. 

So I can knee you in the face for doing it. 

Over and over and over again.

For ruining the 1st E-sport just to pick on me.

replies.body: http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/689/319/4f2.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Void Nargacuga,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-02-07T17:12:47.700+0000)
>
> http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/689/319/4f2.gif

The game is shit.   Thanks to Riot being a dick to me.
[You being bad](https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=F3ORA), on [multiple instances](https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=R3PORTED), at playing the game is not Riot's fault.
How is the best player in all of leauges bad again?

Obviously its not you. So....

https://i.gyazo.com/1879ddad395eac2137cba238079be701.png

Might also want to read up on [this article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dunning%E2%80%93Kruger_effect).
This is like my 19th account bro braw.   From trying to tell know it alls how to play the game.

Keep telling yourself that.

IF your as good as you say you are you would have gotten way past Bronze 3 on R3PORTED, or much higher then Bronze 5 on F3ORA. Show us your godly plays, oh almighty one.

People report you if you try to teach them anything.

You are all cookie cutter players that aren't on my level yet. 

You can't teach an old dog new tricks.  I play unorthodox and don't listen to the people bossing me around every game.  If I ever did I wouldn't be the best Fiora now would I?    Let's be honest.  You people report people for the stupidest reasons like for instance.  AUTO LOCK HATERS.   Notice my name is F3ORA. Would it be such a shock if the best Fiora played Fiora every game?   Insta report.

If I was the same level as you I would be worried.

You are still not the best {{champion:114}} player. Get to challenger 1 THEN you can make that claim.

Am too.  I'm better than all the challenger Fioras. 

People only get there if they have a friend who is also good. 

I'm a loner...  a Fiora.    + I can never get there from people reporting me for not sitting in one lane all game.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-02-07T17:43:29.731+0000)
>
> Am too.  I'm better than all the challenger Fioras. 

Then challenge one and record you kicking their boosted butt so you can show us just how wrong we are.
Heck challenge me, I will throw 5 dollars into League to buy Fiora, play her for my 2nd or 3rd time ever and probably still do decently.

I'll watch this match!

Unless I'm at work when it happens... Please record it if they accept!

Don't worry, I would make a facebook account just so I can share it on facebook and every other form of social media.

Heck, not even saying I am going to win.  I am terrible at those kinds of champions.  I just want to show that I can at least put up a pretty good fight.
My gut says you would win.
Yeah you better win fam xd

Although I have only played ranked for one season, and I am by no means the best at anything, I went from Bronze 5 to silver 3. I can admit I started ranked way too soon....and I'm a support specialist, that means I pretty much have to rely on my lane partner to do well and I too am  loner. The biggest difference is I can admit that I need to get better so I will, you believe you are at the top of your game in bronze so you probably are and until you realize that you need to improve your game you will always be in bronze.

I'm famous for my level 1 pentakills.  

Who does that? 

Nobody is famous for that.  Nobody but me.
In Bronze, yes.

Well let me see your challenger Fiora's do that in bronze then.

They can't.   The best player is a bronze 5 player by choice. 

Try to teach new players you'll be in bronze too because your account will get banned. 
1-30 Bronze life banned 
1-30 Bronze life (Give them advice who to be good?) Banned
1-30 Bronze life, advice, banned 
1-30 Bronze life, advice, banned 
1-30 Bronze life, advice, banned 
1-30 Bronze life, advice, banned 
1-30 Bronze life, advice, banned 
1-30 Bronze life, advice, banned 
1-30 Bronze life, advice, banned 


I'm a teacher. 


Do you think I'm gonna make it to Challenger if I am teaching new players how to be good like me?
Get a rank, then talk. Or else, you're nothing but just an "All Bark No Bite".
Riot literally banned me from ranked and Reworked Fiora because I was too good.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=00070000000000000000000000000000000000010000000000000001,timestamp=2017-02-18T06:33:32.090+0000)
>
> The best Fiora is terrible? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A2hujBpDrS4&t=293s



There's a saying: "**Anything works at low elo**." You can build literally anything, even AP Fiora, and still be able to carry the game. 

Your teammates & enemies in all of your games(_including the ones in this video_) were nothing but non-Level 30s & Bronze, logically speaking, you've only proven yourself to be the "best" in Unranked & Bronze matches.

Which brings us to our conclusion that was mentioned more than a week ago:

http://imgur.com/yVA5a0n

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=00070000000000000000000000000000000000010000000000000005,timestamp=2017-02-18T07:02:14.163+0000)
>
> You keep digging up that score but I was intent feeding blazing mad because bot lane refused to help me when I gank below bot and ping for help. I told them there was no other way they would learn their lesson. The truth.

Still doesn't change the fact that you have never fought anyone who's at least Silver & above, just goes to show that your current MMR just sucks as hell. Your childish & immature feeding also helped contributed it.

Plus, why would you have a problem with me nitpicking that 3/24/5 score when you thought that video you posted many times meant any difference?

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=00070000000000000000000000000000000000010000000000000003,timestamp=2017-02-18T06:49:19.897+0000)
>
> Who cares about ranked when it takes 10 years and 30 dodges to play the game?
> 
> Screw ranked...   
> I can beat any LCS player anyway. 
>  (At least before Riot bullys me and nerfs my main)

Goes 3/24/5 against a bunch of Bronzies, but sure, "beat any LCS player".

3/24/5 

 Pretty sure they banned you from Ranked for being terrible.

I HAVE ACTUAL ADVICE FOR NEW PLAYERS!  WANNA HEAR?

I'VE GOT LOTS OF IT!  

Let me show you why I'm in bronze 5 all the time! 
IT'S BECAUSE PEOPLE DON'T WANT TO HEAR THESE LESSONS:

#1 Pushing is more important than kills
#2 Back up the weakest player instead of calling them that the suck shit
#3 Group more noobs you aren't grouping enough
#4 Farm more than they do and be a level higher than their top guy before you fight
#5 Auto lock haters are actually noobs
#6 Only noobs surrender
#7 People who talk smack all game are noobs
#8 The jungler goes BEHIND bot lane to gank not steal their exp and lane with them Ehh
#9 DEFEND THE BASE YOU GUYS!  Why are you just aimlessly roaming?
#10 Overextending by yourself... wHYYY?            
#11 TANK FIGHTS FIRST NOT THE CARRY EHHhhHH Why do I have to go 1st every time?
#12 Farm the jungle more if you are low level.
#13 The one with the most monsters killed is the one doing the most for your team
#14 Walk with the strongest champ on your team instead
#15 Flash and ignight always
#16 Hide in the bush as a team noobs
#17 WHY ARE YOU PUSHING SO HARD BOT?  Can't you hide in the bush and gank? No...
#18 Stop stealing buffs and kills from the carry to be a jerk... It's not good for the team.
#19 You aren't better than me so why are you stealing from the carry? 
#20 If you post about this stuff on the message boards they will just down vote you because they are all know it all dickheads.

You haven't even finished placements, so 19 is a very invalid point. The last time I finished placements of 5 wins & 5 loss if I remembered so far, it got me to Gold 3. 

It's not mainly about how many wins you get off placements. It depends on how your performance is. You think you're good, go rekt that top laner instead of whining here. That's why you can usually relax on placements more than actual LP-climbing rank games.

> [{quoted}](name=Void Nargacuga,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-07T17:22:40.325+0000)
>
> Obviously its not you. So....
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/1879ddad395eac2137cba238079be701.png
> 
> Might also want to read up on [this article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dunning%E2%80%93Kruger_effect).

You WISH it was the Dunning–Kruger effect.   I actually GET 40 and 0 scores and level 1 pentakills.  Or I did before Riot squashed all that.   I'm R3PORTED.
At best you where Bronze 3 on R3PORTED (as I linked it earlier). Show us these amazing games please.

> [{quoted}](name=Void Nargacuga,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2017-02-07T17:17:59.629+0000)
>
> [You being bad](https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=F3ORA), on [multiple instances](https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=R3PORTED), at playing the game is not Riot's fault.

I'm not bad I'm the best. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A2hujBpDrS4&t=335s
Then climb outta Bronze and show everyone you are actually good.

lol so you can abuse that unbalanced shit even more?

get some skill, new Fiora is way better and healthier
So...never?

No YOU get some skill. 

Play zed or Raamus instead of being such a crybaby. 

Gotta rain on my parade just cause I'm actually better at the game than all you guys.
Fiora had counters.  It's the player not the champ.   You pigeon holed Fiora cause I was such a good player.

_Season 6 Bronze_

right now i don't even know anymore if you are serious or trolling

http://i.imgur.com/dLfPsSw.png?1

Dafuq

Just a troll. Haven't seen them around for a while. 

Honestly I'm surprised by the lack of trolls. There's either a lack of stuf to complain about (because they often just jump on the bandwagon) or there's too much to complain about and they actually have a serious concern.
I guess but ive seen people who actually think like this. Disturbing

For the sake of your sanity I would suggest you don't actually take the OP's post as a serious thought process. 

Trolls are trolls.
Oh im well aware of whats troll and whats real and this some pretty bad trolling by OP. Im just saying its pretty disturbing when people are so delusional that they think like this
http://theartofthecookie.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Keep-Calm-and-Eat-a-Delicious-Cookie-Cookie-Meme.jpg
You better share damn it
lol Fuck you. The new Fiora is great. Why don't you relearn her and see how godly strong she is instead of making ridiculous and childish demands from a company that isn't even listening to you?

Because with the new one I get 40 and 7 instead of 40 and 0.

That's why.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-02-07T17:08:31.305+0000)
>
> Because with the new one I get 40 and 7 instead of 40 and 0.
> 
> That's why.

Counterplay.

She is not even the same champ.

Don't talk about Fiora.  You were not the greatest Fiora of all time.  

You are random shit talkers.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aGVjPsHu,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-07T17:12:20.600+0000)
>
> She is not even the same champ.
> 
> Don't talk about Fiora.  You were not the greatest Fiora of all time.  
> 
> You are random shit talkers.

Neither were you, asshat. SKT's top laner gets that honor
